scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Segmentation Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer segmentation model deployed by a bank.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer individual customer attributes, violating privacy regulations and potentially exposing sensitive financial information.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a publicly available customer segmentation model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A major bank has publicly released a simplified version of its customer segmentation model for research purposes, inadvertently exposing it to model inversion attacks.
